name: Dizigot
overview:
Wikipedia for regular people.

Dizigot is a portal where you showcase yourself to the gazillion internet users out there who are googling your name. It is an online dashboard to fortify your e-presence & manage your reputation online & get an idea on how people on the internet perceive you. Dizigot is a twist on the Word “Dizygote” which refers to a non-Identical twin. We believe that in each of us there reside two selves: one who lives in the physical world (You!) and the other who resides in the cyber Space (Dizigot!). Dizigot’s idea is to help you manage your e-alter ego

How many times have you googled your own name? How many times have you googled the name of someone you met last evening in a party? How many times have you had a tough time finding people on the current closed social networks? How many times have you not been trustful of people online?

The rhetoric questions above are just a small fraction of the unanswered questions! Dizigot allows you to create a Wikipedia style profile page for you which is open to all and helps them find you. Pool-in all your social networks links strewn all over the web to create your Virtual Business Card. There’s a never a stranger on the internet with Dizigot: get to know who the real person is behind the ubiquitous profile pictures.
